definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: So this characteristic satisfies the need of the E-GOV System.
sentences.chinese: 這種特性恰恰滿足了電子政務系統開發的需要。

sentences.english: Chapter 2 is "E-government GIS' running mechanism and model of the frame".
sentences.chinese: 第二章是“政務GIS的建設運行機制和框架模型”。

sentences.english: Top-design is very important for information resource management system in e-government.
sentences.chinese: 實例證明電子政務信息資源管理系統需要頂層設計。

sentences.english: In the construction of e_government, the phenomenon of "sef_governed information" is ubiquitous.
sentences.chinese: 當前電子政務建設中普遍存在“信息孤島”現象。

sentences.english: Sharing of government information resource is the critical link in the construction of E-government.
sentences.chinese: 政府信息資源共享是電子政務建設的重要內容。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Mr Abbas could stay in charge as a caretaker.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，阿巴斯將會繼續照料政務。

sentences.english: to organize and coordinate the application of electronic administration.
sentences.chinese: 組織協調機關電子政務應用工作。

sentences.english: Part three analyzing the ten strong county government websites construction and its application condition.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，十強縣政府電子政務建設及應用狀況分析。

sentences.english: Take a seat please, Councillor Jones will see you in a moment.
sentences.chinese: 請稍坐，瓊斯政務委員即刻就見你。

sentences.english: Sharing of government information resources is the critical link in the construction of E-government.
sentences.chinese: 政府信息資源共享是電子政務建設的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: The Netherlands will continue to handle foreign and defence policy.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭政府會繼續處理外交與國防政務。

sentences.english: The second part elaborated the E-government in our country's state of play.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分論述了電子政務在我國的發展情況。

sentences.english: This thesis revolves about the implications we can draw from Relevance-Adjustability Theoretical Approach (RATA in short) for the teaching of interpretation for political affairs.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要探討了關聯順應理論對政務口譯教學的啓示。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has braced itself for more administrative transparency.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府已做好準備增加政務透明度。

sentences.english: Joining the election would at least prevent Chief Secretary Donald Tsang Yam-kuen, the frontrunner, being returned unopposed.
sentences.chinese: 參選至少可以阻止大熱門政務司司長曾蔭權自動當選。

sentences.english: Sixth, most government officials are quite accustomed to the political environment.
sentences.chinese: 政務官對於國內的政治生態環境皆能適應。
